price: 48. Y no obedezcas a quienes rechazan la verdad ni a los hipócritas,no hagas caso de sus ofensas y encomiéndate a Al-lah; Él te basta como protector.
arabic: وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَدَعۡ أَذَىٰهُمۡ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wal-munāfiqīna wadaʿ adhāhum watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
